Text: Ryan Kenny  13 September 2019  Last week National Savings and Investments (NS&I) withdrew its one and three-year Guaranteed Growth and Income bonds from sale with immediate effect. It also cut rates for both new customers and some savers rolling over. It'll cost savers nearly £60m in lost interest.
Cause: Ryan Kenny  13 September 2019  Last week National Savings and Investments (NS&I) withdrew its one and three-year Guaranteed Growth and Income bonds from sale with immediate effect.
Effect: It'll cost savers nearly £60m in lost interest.
Sentence: <e1>Ryan Kenny  13 September 2019  Last week National Savings and Investments (NS&I) withdrew its one and three-year Guaranteed Growth and Income bonds from sale with immediate effect.</e1> It also cut rates for both new customers and some savers rolling over. <e2>It'll cost savers nearly £60m in lost interest.</e2>
